import Container from'../components/layout/container';import RegisterForm from'../components/registerForm/registerForm';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Register(){var navigate=useNavigate();function createUser(user){fetch("http://localhost:5000/users",{method:"POST",headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(user)}).then(function(resp){return resp.json();}).then(function(data){return navigate("/login",{state:'Usuário cadastrado com sucesso!'});}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{customClass:"center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Register"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RegisterForm,{handleSubmit:createUser,btnText:"Cadastrar-se"})]});}export default Register;
